org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.astar

Class AStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.astar.AStar

  • public class AStar
extends java.lang.Object
    The major part of this class has been directly copy/pasted from the graphstrean AStar source code, distributed under a GPLv3 license.

    This has been done for efficiency reasons, to directly use the our graph structure and avoid multiplying information with graph copies.

      • graph

      • costs

        protected Costs costs
        How to compute the path cost, the cost between two nodes and the heuristic. The heuristic to estimate the distance from the current position to the target.

        New A* algorithm on a given graph.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • setCosts

        public void setCosts(Costs costs)
        Specify how various costs are computed. The costs object is in charge of computing the cost of displacement from one node to another (and therefore allows to compute the cost from the source node to any node). It also allows to compute the heuristic to use for evaluating the cost from the current position to the target node. Calling this DOES NOT clear the currently computed paths.
        Parameters:
        costs - The cost method to use.

      • getShortestPath

        public java.util.List<Node> getShortestPath()
        The computed path, or null if nor result was found.
        Returns:
        The computed path, or null if no path was found.

      • compute

        public void compute(java.lang.String source,
                    java.lang.String target)
        Compute the shortest path between the source and sink nodes.
        Parameters:
        source - source node ID
        target - target node ID

      • getNextBetterNode

        protected org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.environment.graph.astar.AStar.AStarNode getNextBetterNode()
        Find the node with the lowest rank in the open list.
        Returns:
        The node of open that has the lowest rank.
